QuestData.Title: The First Step
QuestData.Description: Like any good bloodmage, I perform my magic with blood. All blood is different, and the Blasted Lands has several useful flavors, if you know where to look.$b$bFor our purposes? Basilisks and hyenas, even amounts. We're going to need plenty of it. Head west, to the center of the Blasted Lands. And don't forget... you can use that teleporter!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 9 vials of Snickerfang Hyena Blood and 9 vials of Redstone Basilisk Blood.
QuestData.RewardText: <Kasim eyes the blood hungrily.>$b$bMore than enough, and still warm! Now, let's get this ritual started, shall we?
